nodes.text: The Corsair-class cruiser was an 18-meter heavy assault starfighter built by SoroSuub. It was armed with two turbolaser batteries and a pair of ion cannons.

Five of these starfighters were used by the Cavrilhu Pirates to attack Iphigin just before the Caamas Document crisis struck the New Republic, proving to be rather well-defended in terms of shield and armor.

The only statistics available for the Corsair-class cruiser come from the Red Lancer and the Blue Queen which are both identified as heavily modified. The stats on this page are thus those of modified Corsairs, and the stock model would likely be much less powerful.
